<div class="page-header home-header">
<h1>Where is your bus?</h1>
<h2>Let's find out.  We provide tools to make it easy to access<br/>real-time transit information using open data sources.</h2>
</div>

<div class="column-row">

<div class="one-third column">

=== Our Goal ===

<p>[[What is OneBusAway?  **Find out.**>>http://onebusaway.org/p/WhatIsOneBusAway.action]]</p>

<p>We want to make it easier to use public transit by providing easy access to schedule and real-time arrival information for the buses and trains you ride every day.</p>

<p>We provide:</p>

* Real-time arrival information for your <a href="where/standard/agencies.action">transit agency</a>.
* Easy access to information across a variety of devices.
* Other cool transit tools.

<p>Why? We're riders just like you and we don't like waiting for the bus any more than we have to.</p>
</div>

<div class="one-third column">

=== Our Project ===

<p>OneBusAway provides a collection of [[open-source tools>>https://github.com/OneBusAway/onebusaway/wiki/]] designed
  to work with open transit data like [[GTFS>>https://developers.google.com/transit/gtfs/]] and
  [[GTFS-realtime>>https://developers.google.com/transit/gtfs-realtime/]].  Our work is all open-source software, so
  that others may reuse and build upon our efforts.</p> 

<p>This is the [[**OBA Application Suite**>>https://github.com/OneBusAway/onebusaway-application-modules/wiki]],
  which provides a variety of tools and interfaces for accessing real-time transit information.  For more info:</p> 

[[**Check out the GitHub project page**>>https://github.com/OneBusAway/onebusaway-application-modules/wiki]]</p>
